title: GameMaker-Studio Master Collection Crack FINAL
description:
This is it, the final crack for GMS.

This crack will work on EVERY version of GMS so there is no need to worry about grabbing a new torrent every time YoYo updates GMS.

All export modules are available, and will automatically show up as YoYo adds new ones, just make sure you update GMS every now and then to keep up with the latest features.


This release requires that you have steam installed, so you will need to install steam before using anything in this torrent.

After steam is installed, run "Install GameMaker Studio" to open the GMS installer inside steam.

The last step is to use the installer ("GMStudio-Installer.exe") that i have included to install the crack.

You need to run GMS from the start menu shortcut or desktop shortcut to run Master Collection, otherwise you will only get the free version of GMS running.

To update, run GMS from inside steam and it should update if your settings are set to update during launch.

-VeryC-
